price: Nad njima će biti naslage vatre, a i ispod njih naslage – time Allah straši robove Svoje. O robovi Moji, bojte se Mene!
arabic: لَهُم مِّن فَوۡقِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِن تَحۡتِهِمۡ ظُلَلٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ ٱللَّهُ بِهِۦ عِبَادَهُۥۚ يَٰعِبَادِ فَٱتَّقُونِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lahum min fawqihim ẓulalun mina al-nāri wamin taḥtihim ẓulalun dhālika yukhawwifu al-lahu bihi ʿibādahu yāʿibādi fa-ittaqūni
